items.title: Horizon Shortfall Scheme Appeals process guidance and principles
items.summary: Guidance for making an appeal under the Horizon Shortfall Scheme Appeals (HSSA) process and the underlying principles of how cases are assessed.

items.title: Transparency data: Department for Business and Trade (DBT) prompt payment data July to September 2025
items.summary: How long the Department for Business and Trade (DBT) took to pay invoices in the period July to September 2025.

items.title: Transparency data: DBT: spending over £500, September 2025
items.summary: Spending by electronic purchasing card solution (ePCS), over £500.

items.title: Transparency data: DBT: spending over £25,000, October 2025
items.summary: Reports on departmental spending over £25,000.

items.title: Pan-Euro Mediterranean Convention on Rules of Origin (PEM)
items.summary: The Department for Business and Trade (DBT) is seeking views on the potential impacts of UK accession to the Regional Convention on Pan-Euro Mediterranean Preferential Rules of Origin (PEM).

items.title: Proposed refinements for Allocation Round 8 and future rounds
items.summary: We're seeking views on several refinements to ensure that the CfD continues to reflect current policy and that the scheme continues to function as originally intended.

items.title: Accredited official statistics: Weekly road fuel prices
items.summary: Road fuel price statistics providing average UK retail 'pump' prices on a weekly basis.

items.title: Notice: Notice to exporters 2025/33: open general export licences (OGELs) updated
items.summary: The Export Control Joint Unit (ECJU) has updated 8 OGELs.

items.title: Guidance: Open general export licence (export of dual-use items to EU member states)
items.summary: Licence for the export of of dual-use items to EU member states.

items.title: Guidance: Open general export licence PCBs and components for military goods
items.summary: Licence allowing the export or transfer of printed circuit boards (PCBs) and components for military goods.

items.title: Guidance: Open general export licence export after repair/replacement under warranty: dual-use items
items.summary: Licence allowing the export of dual-use items imported into the UK for repair or replacement under warranty.

items.title: Guidance: Open general export licence export for repair/replacement under warranty: dual-use items
items.summary: Licence allowing the export of dual-use items returned to the original country of import for repair or replacement under warranty.

items.title: Guidance: Open general export licence military goods: A400M collaborative programme
items.summary: Licence allowing the export or transfer of goods, software or technology for the A400M collaborative programme.

items.title: Guidance: Open general export licence (dual-use items: India)
items.summary: This licence permits the export of certain dual-use items to India.

items.title: Guidance: Open general export licence (export after exhibition: dual-use items)
items.summary: Licence allowing the export of dual-use items if they have been temporarily imported into the UK for exhibition or demonstration.

items.title: Official Statistics: UK security export statistics 2024
items.summary: Estimates of UK and rest of world security exports for 2024.

items.title: Changes to energy infrastructure planning application fees
items.summary: We are seeking views on proposed changes to fees for energy infrastructure planning applications.

items.title: Guidance: Open general export licence technology for dual-use items
items.summary: Licence allowing the export of technology for dual-use items.

items.title: Guidance: Horizon Shortfall Scheme: contacting the independent Senior Lawyer
items.summary: Information about how to raise an issue with the independent Senior Lawyer to the Horizon Shortfall Scheme (HSS).

items.title: Guidance: Horizon Shortfall Scheme: issues under review
items.summary: Information about issues that the independent Senior Lawyer (ISL) is currently reviewing.

items.title: Guidance: Horizon Shortfall Scheme: independent Senior Lawyer scope of work
items.summary: The role of the independent Senior Lawyer (ISL) and the procedures and processes they will follow.

items.title: Cutting edge cancer treatments set to be produced out of uranium
items.summary: Precision treatments tackling the hardest-to-treat cancers set to be produced from hundreds of tonnes of reprocessed uranium from nuclear reactors

items.title: Nissan launches £450m next-generation LEAF in major vote of confidence in UK’s Industrial Strategy
items.summary: Nissan have launched their next-generation LEAF in Sunderland, marking a major boost for the UK’s automotive industry.

items.title: New council of experts to advocate for the creative industries
items.summary: The Creative Industries Council (CIC) is a key forum that brings together Government and the businesses and trade bodies of the UK’s creative industries

items.title: Independent report: Review of AI deployment in the electricity networks: terms of reference
items.summary: Terms of reference for the independent review.

items.title: Notice: CCUS Humber capture project market survey
items.summary: A short market-sounding exercise to update the Department’s understanding of the Humber region’s carbon capture projects.

items.title: Guidance: Heat networks regulation: technical standards
items.summary: We are introducing regulatory technical requirements and a Heat Network Technical Assurance Scheme (HNTAS) to help heat network operators demonstrate compliance with these requirements.

items.title: Guidance: DESNZ Public Attitudes Tracker: technical report, Winter 2024 to Summer 2025
items.summary: A technical report to accompany the Winter 2024, Spring 2025 and Summer 2025 waves of the DESNZ Public Attitudes Tracker.

items.title: Oil and gas: environmental submissions and determinations
items.summary: Interested parties can review records of applications and statements submitted to OPRED as required by environmental regulations.

items.title: Oil and gas: offshore environmental legislation
items.summary: Environmental regulations and guidance on offshore oil and gas exploration and production offshore gas unloading and storage and offshore carbon dioxide storage activities

items.summary: Draft procedures that Heat Network Technical Assurance Scheme (HNTAS) registered assessors will need to follow to assess a heat network’s compliance with HNTAS technical requirements.
